name: Displayport Device Cable - 6 ft | Dell USA
description: DisplayPort Device Cable from Tripp®Lite is used for a digital display interface standard put forth by the Video Electronics Standards Association (VESA). The DisplayPort defines a digital audio/video interconnect intended to be used between computer and display monitors, or computers and home theater systems. It supports both Digital Video/Audio signals and is geared more toward the computer market. Featuring a maximum bandwidth of 10.8Gbps, this cable also supports DPCP (DisplayPort Content Protection), HDCP (High Definition Content Protection) and resolutions up to 1080p. Furthermore, it has length of 6 ft adding to your convenience.
